title: FS: 100+ SGC T206s &  15+ SGC T205s (Price drop)
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: 100+ SGC T206s &  15+ SGC T205s (Price drop)
posts.post_content:
All prices include delivery, payment through Paypal goods is more than fine. If you're willing to pay with Payment Owed, I won't fight you! 

If you want to make an offer for multiple cards, please do not refrain from doing so - no matter what the offer is. The worst I'll say is "Thanks for the interest, but I won't be able to do that." No offense will be taken.

E-mail better than pm if you want a fast response: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]

I don't see a zoom option on photobucket, but if you download the scans, you'll get a view of the card that presents every flaw. If you aren't able to do that, and want larger scans - e-mail me and I'll send them over. If you have any questions, let me know.

Scans/Prices of T205s:

[url]http://s1307.photobucket.com/user/the_coop/library/T205%20For%20sale?sort=4&page=1[/url]

Scans/Prices of T206s:

[url]http://s1307.photobucket.com/user/the_coop/library/T206%20T207?sort=4&page=1[/url]

.
Hi Nate, interested in 3 cards, sent an email.  thanks!  Cliff

16 cards sold and marked to reflect sale. 

Thanks everyone
Still plenty available, have sold 16 or so  --- would like to clear some more out!
Collins and friends arrived today... thanks Nate!
Got the cards today, thanks for the quick shipment!
Got my 2 cards today as well - Thanks Nate!

What is the price if I took The Barry (SGC 20), Beck (SGC 20), Blackburne (SGC A), Doyle (PSA 4), Fiene (SGC 20), Latham (SGC 35), Livingstone (SGC 10), Lobert (SGC 20), Shag (SGC 10) and Wiltse (SGC 10)

Looking to move more!

I added some of the "NFS" Old Mills list to the main gallery for T206s. 


Have a great Memorial Day weekend ya'll.
